title: Tata Power sets up 50K home chargers for EVs since April'23, says company
description: Tata Power has established 50,000 home chargers for electric vehicles across India and over 500 charging points for electric buses in metropolitan cities since April last year. Since 2018, the company has set up one lakh EV chargers nationwide, supporting e-mobility adoption with a reliable charging experience at home.
